immunity_markdown: death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious
markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Skeleton Guard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=372)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The most common skeletal minions are mere guardians.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Skeleton Guard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=372)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 298</row>

**Perception** +2; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +3

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (20 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +2 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +2 

</row>

**HP** 4
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious

**Resistances**
cold 5, electricity 5, fire 5, piercing 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
scimitar +6 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +6 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6  piercing

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-92" />
name: Skeleton Guard
